item.title: Getting started with slick
item.description: Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting slick set up or installed. http://kenwheeler.github.io/slick/ Slick Slider is easy to use and to customise. It provides good amount of customisation options including responsive options based on breakpoints. To get started with slick, it is not that difficult. Just download the js and css files from their website, create your html code and fire the plugin using single line of jQuery as shown below:
